import {css} from "emotion";
import { isString } from "lodash";
 
// import {unitMath,applyUnitIfRequired} from "../../../utils/css-utils";
import styleMemoize from "../../../utils/style-memoize";
import flaggedStyles from "../../../utils/flagged-styles";
// import {unitMath} from "../../utils/css-utils";
import getMenuVars from "../menu/menu.var";
 
import { darken, makeReadable } from "../../../utils/css-utils";
 
 
export default styleMemoize(function(flags = [],variation,width) {
 
  const menuVars = getMenuVars();
 
  const {
    labelBackground,
    labelTextColor,
    labelVerticalPadding,
    labelHorizontalPadding,
    getColor,
    firstReadableColor,
  } = menuVars;
 
  let background = labelBackground;
  let textColor = labelTextColor;
  let classLabel = "listview-label";
  
  let basicBorderColor = "rgba(0,0,0,0.2)";
  let basicTextColor = "inherit";
 
  Iif (variation) {
    const color = getColor(variation);
    background = color;
    textColor = firstReadableColor(color, ["#ffffff", makeReadable(color, color)]);
    basicBorderColor = darken(color, 10);
    basicTextColor = makeReadable(color);
    if (isString(variation)) {
      classLabel = `${variation}-${classLabel}`;
    }
  }
 
  return flaggedStyles(classLabel,flags,{
 
    _: ()=>(css`
 
      display: block;
      font-weight:normal;
      margin-left:0;
      margin-top:0;
      font-size: 0.8em;
      line-height:1.3em;
      border-radius:0.3em;
      overflow:hidden;
      text-align: center;
      width: ${width == null ? "auto" : `${width}px`};
      max-width: 100%;
 
      background: ${background};
      color: ${textColor};
      padding: ${labelVerticalPadding} ${labelHorizontalPadding};
 
      & i {
        display:inline;
        vertical-align: text-bottom;
      }
    `),
 
    basic: ()=>(css`
      border-style: solid;
      border-color:${basicBorderColor};
      border-width:1px;
      background:none;
      color: ${basicTextColor};
    `),
 
    "basic,left": ()=>(css`
      border-radius:0;
      border-width:0 1px 0 0;
      padding-left:0,
    `),
 
 
  });
});
